mapper.select: SELECT sys_config.config_id, sys_config.name, sys_config.code, sys_config.value, sys_config.memo, sys_config.status FROM sys_config AS sys_config ORDER BY sys_config.create_time ASC
SELECT sys_config.config_id, sys_config.name, sys_config.code, sys_config.value, sys_config.memo FROM sys_config AS sys_config WHERE sys_config.config_id = #{configId}

SELECT sys_config.config_id, sys_config.name, sys_config.code, sys_config.value, sys_config.memo, sys_config.update_user_id, sys_config.update_Time FROM sys_config AS sys_config WHERE sys_config.config_id = #{configId}
SELECT sys_config.value FROM sys_config AS sys_config WHERE sys_config.code = #{code} AND sys_config.status = #{status}
